column1: Smoque BBQ////The side dishes are simply alright.  A little bit small if you ask me.  They are all served in little tinfoil cups
column2: except for the beans and cole slaw
column3: which are served in the classy styro containers. The beans are made with chunks of chopped brisket and are definitely the best option of the few.  For dessert
column4: Smoque offers a peach cobbler served in the same tinfoil cup.  Not bad
column5: just tossed up there on the menu.
